title: Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! (Welcome to Pia Carrot)
synopsis: Yusuke Kinoshita is forced by his father to work at his restaurant Pia Carrot all summer due to his bad grades in school. What first seems to be a boring job becomes a memorable experience due to his interactions with his co-workers and his boss.
related_anime: ['Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! 2', 'Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! 2 DX', 'Pia Carrot e Youkoso!!: Sayaka no Koi Monogatari']
